title: sotelorene
author: sotelorene
content: Most people think life is a bed of roses where you can get anything you want so easily,  well some people are born with silver spoon while some are  not. Those who are not born with silver spoon instead of them to work or hustle genuinely they rather go into things that won't stress them,  things that are not genuine,  things that will lead to destruction,  things that are not worth it. Most of our youth are so lazy to the extend that the houses they live in they can't clean it,  talk more of going to look for a job that will fetch them money. Like I said earlier most of our youth don't come from a rich background and yet they select the type of job they will do, a job that the least person in the society can do,  yes everyone knows that some job are hard but this category of people am talking about do not prefer anyone at all.  However,  since this set of people have decided not to work for somebody or under person.  I think they should start learning cryptocurrency form their comfort zone at least it will save them stress but more time.

comments.body: You know Humans are built different and character differs. comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Laziness and pride and two dangerous combination but unfortunately, there are people that have both. There is the trend in Nigeria called "soft life" that is rendering youths very lazy yet desiring the sweet things of life. Most of them are not ready to do any challenging job, be it physically or mentally challenging... yet they want the result like now. Girls are not exempted from this and theirs is even worse. Many girls are not ready to fo through any stress and while in university,  reading is even considered stress. Their own just to much abeg. One thing that is certain is that, when laxity combines with pride, it will surely lead to under performance and most times to poverty.
